Name: Rest in peace my fellow Londoners

Content.summary: 'Rest in peace my fellow Londoners' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about London, War Conflict, Social Issues written on 07 July 2006
Content.bodyText:
Rest in peace my fellow Londoners.

A year ago today London suffered suicide bomb attacks. A number of people were killed including and old school friend.

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk/5153678.stm
